# ParseOptions.strictPluralKeys property

By default, the parser will reject any plural keys that are not valid [Unicode CLDR](http://cldr.unicode.org/index/cldr-spec/plural-rules) plural category keys. Setting `strictPluralKeys: false` will disable this check.

**Signature:**

```typescript
strictPluralKeys?: boolean;
```
